H0.text: In which prison was 'Amy' born in the novel 'Little Dorrit'. Marshalsea

H1.text: In which prison was 'Amy' born in the novel 'Little Dorrit'. Fleet Prison

H2.text: In which prison was 'Amy' born in the novel 'Little Dorrit'. Newgate Prison

H3.text: In which prison was 'Amy' born in the novel 'Little Dorrit'. Chummage

A4.text: The story features Amy Dorrit, youngest child of her family, born and raised in the Marshalsea prison for debtors in London.
